posts.post_content:
*CY IS SOLD*

Sharp card with a perfectly registered image of Cy which displays a nice bold green background (no creases)

[STRIKE]$7000[/STRIKE] $6,750 delivered - emails only if you'd like to discuss. No PM's please 

A commitment to purchase outweighs any ongoing negotiation.

If paying via PayPal, please add 3%

Thanks all, Tony
[url]andreatny@q.com[/url]

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/threetwocount/threetwocount/t206cyyoungpsa4front.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/threetwocount/threetwocount/t206cyyoungpsa4back.jpg[/IMG]
Beautiful card Tony, good luck on it!
Thanks Michael. Good to hear from you!

[quote name="Gpaal" post=2223174]Tony amazing card good luck.[/QUOTE]

Hi George and thank you. 

A one and only 5 day bump w/ an updated price of $6,750 delivered!

A Psa 4 in REA's recent auction sold for more than this ;)

Payment via check - no fee's
Payment via PayPal would still require a 3% adder
Card is stunning, good luck, Tony!
